content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s mulberry merino 1 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% mulberry silk approximately 554 yards required we used wheat flour ballet pink and dark loam - us 5 3 75 mm straight or circular needles 3 gauge 22 stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions 9 inches wide x 78 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
